name: Legend (1994)
description: Legend is a Beat'em up game that resembles games like Final Fight, or Streets of Rage. The game features a medieval setting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Core 2 or Athlon 64 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: All included versions are emulated.

reviews.review_text: Overall this is a fun cooperative beatemâ€™up game on the Super Nintendo. There are a couple times where I felt annoyed by bosses but for the most part enjoyed my time playing. The unique feature of being able to use a shield could have added some depth but it was not executed well enough.
